invocations.description: Returns the coordinates of the given special area.
invocations.ex:
local pos = getareaposition('SpecialArea1')

if pos.x == 33333 and pos.y == 44444 and pos.z == 5 then
	setareaposition('SpecialArea1', 66666, 77777, 8)
end
invocations.exDescription: It'll change the 'SpecialArea1' position coordinates from 33333:44444:5 to 66666:77777:8.
